name: Blinded
summary: Can't see; auto-fails sight checks; attacks vs target have advantage, target attacks have disadvantage.

name: Charmed
summary: Can't attack charmer; charmer has advantage on social checks vs target.

name: Frightened
summary: Disadvantage while source is visible; can't willingly move closer to source.

name: Grappled
summary: Speed 0; ends if grappler is incapacitated or moved away.

name: Invisible
summary: Unseen; advantage to hit unseen creature, disadvantage to hit others.

name: Paralyzed
summary: Incapacitated, can't move; auto-fail Str/Dex saves; attacks have advantage; melee crits.

name: Poisoned
summary: Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

name: Prone
summary: Crawl; disadvantage on attacks; attackers within 5 ft have advantage, others have disadvantage.

name: Restrained
summary: Speed 0; attacks vs target have advantage; target attacks have disadvantage; Dex saves disadvantage.

name: Stunned
summary: Incapacitated, can't move; attacks vs target have advantage; fails Str/Dex saves.

name: Unconscious
summary: Incapacitated, drop items, prone; attacks vs target have advantage; melee crits; fails Str/Dex saves.
